name: BOARDRIDERS, INC.
sampleDescriptions: Educate Members of Congress and the Administration on impacts of proposed tariffs on the apparel industry.
Discuss negative impacts of proposed and potential tariffs on apparel and finished goods on the U.S. apparel industry.
